alert.note: Alert for Caddo; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:08AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Webster, eastern De Soto, Red River, northwestern Natchitoches, southern Caddo, southwestern Bienville and southern Bossier Parishes through 345 AM CDT... At 307 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Karnack to 7 miles southeast of Shreveport to 11 miles east of Mansfield to 9 miles northeast of Zwolle. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Haughton, Blanchard, Coushatta, Benton, Ringgold, Sibley, Doyline, Dubberly, Heflin, Eastwood, Fosters, Martin, Hall Summit, Lucky, Ashland, Castor, Edgefield and Jamestown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caddo; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River
